cu.explanation_en: Setting mac_log_level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting mac_log_level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors during initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 mac_log_level 設定為無效值 'invalid' 會在初始化期間導致日誌配置錯誤。
